songs.title: 513 Anthem
songs.lyrics:
Reezy:

Letsgetit..

R Double EZY, you know that
Pull up on the scene, picture perfect like Kodak
Niggas sag they pants to they knees, throwback
Reezy can't rap? Pause.. Hold That
Snakes in the grass so you know I had to mow that
Flow so cold, home boy were yo coat at? (Burr)
Flow too tight home boy you should know that
Catch up man,you slippin in the mustard
Cute face lightskin, ye imma cuff her
If she play games get Sammy to snuff her
I'm a real nigga, man i ain't no bluffer
Eat that beat, lunch, dinner and supper
Yeah i do it big like Stewie's brother
Kisses on her neck, but i ain't no lover
Ain't no other, Reezy hella rare
Up in the clouds, Smokey the bear

Reezy [Hook] :
5 1 3 .. dats my squad (Squad)
5 1 3 E N T (ENT)
Dats my squad (Squaaad)

Grizzy:
Everywhere we go, theres money in the makin
Niggas talk alot, but this bullshit i dont know?
Why they flexin on us? Jockers tryna rock with us (Rockk)
F- this beef shit, go fuck your thots
These niggas waste, they ain't got no taste bruh
I'm lookin at the J's bruh
I woke up, Smoke a blunt bruh
I call dat shit wake and bake bruh
Shakin niggas off, thats 2K
I'm all good, you niggas soft
Give you one punch, thats a diddy boy (Bop)
These niggas shook like a bunny hop (Like Bunnyy Hopp)

Reezy [Hook] :
5 1 3 .. dats my squad (Squad)
5 1 3 E N T (ENT)
Dats my squad (Squaaad)

Smokes:
Smokey the naame, these niggas lame
Your bitch is insane, you must feel shame
Catch me in my lane, I'm high like a plan
You think its jokes? This kush yeah i smoke? (Dat loud, dat loud)
I'm outta control, I need a remote
She givin me throat like a facebook post, and it ain't no jooke
Reezy my broo (Broskii)
Yah Dun nu knoo
Tryna stack this gwuap, everything i pack, come get it for the looow

Reezy [Hook] :
5 1 3 .. dats my squad (Squad)
5 1 3 E N T (ENT)
Dats my squad (Squaaad)

SK:
God damn i love this beat, got your girlfriend in my sheets
God damn she a mufuckin freakin (She a freaak)
I already kno she feelin me
The way she scream my name
She uset to be on dat shit
While she give me brain
Drank in my cup i'm leanin mayne
513 killin shit cause we in da game
Smokey on dat dopey dope, SK don't wife no ho
She tryna fuck but i only want throat
Tryna make it to the top and get the bank roll (Bankk Rolll)
Hit the mall spend on da team (On the teaam)
God damn my flow so mean
Got J's, Got Louie,Got Gucci, Got Truie
Cause my swag so clean

Reezy [Hook] :
5 1 3 .. dats my squad (Squad)
5 1 3 E N T (ENT)
Dats my squad (Squaaad)

raw.embed_content: Read “513 Anthem” by Reezy on Genius
raw.full_title: 513 Anthem by Reezy (Ft. Grizzy, S.K. & Smokes)

songs.title: Hustlin Flow
songs.lyrics:
[Hook: Euroz]
Back against the wall, so used to them odds
Still need more wants, hustlin' flow
Everything's a go, except for my soul
Do a drink [?], hustlin' flow
Hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow
Hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow

[Verse 1: Reezy]
Jet black old school like how bow dat
Tell that bitch cash me out, how bow dat
... school days
I was hustlin' at the [?]
Hey I'm undercover I'm rockin' the same grails
Fucking nine-to-five I'm trynna do more than just to maintain
[?] OGs with original rollies plain jane
They always clocking in and that's when the game change
Hustlin' flow, I feel like EJ, gelato in my wee-tray, [?]
Crime [?] on the table like DEA
[?]
When you come from the mud, I need hun'eds on hun'eds

[Hook: Euroz]
Back against the wall, so you used to them odds
Still need more wants, hustlin' flow
Everything's a go, except for my soul
Do a drink [?], hustlin' flow
Hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow
Hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow


[Verse 2: Euroz]
Tryna see the vision through, we can’t let the fuckshit blind us
If it ain’t the bank then the lab is where you’ll find us
I ain’t never put a period where God placed a comma
While avoiding shit that got my boy caught but ain’t no sign up
Got a problem with some shit then point it out except in line-ups
They talk about they moves but see they actions never line up
See you about to win, check your temp they hit your line ups
Since school been on that grade A but never made the honors
Aside from detectives or a judge I'm always honest
Shout out to my Unc, more like a pops was always on us
Uplift the west, I got the hoodin' talk, living life like it ain't took its toll
I know myself, bulletproof my dreams, now good to go
I know myself bulletproof dreams, and now I'm good to go
Hustlin' flow

[Hook: Euroz]
Back against the wall, so you used to them odds
Still need more wants, hustlin' flow
Everything's a go, except for my soul
Do a drink [?], hustlin' flow
Hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow
Hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow


[Outro: Euroz]
Hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, oh
Hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, oh
Hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow, oh
Hustlin' flow, hustlin' flow
Hey, coming down the street on the city lights, gotta get it when I'm alive
Imma tell young [?]
It's just for the [?], we need all the [?]

songs.title: Dead Or Alive
songs.lyrics:
(Reezy).                                                                                                                         Verse 1
And so it go lights camera action
I hope that imma spit this shit clear with no need for captions
Its funny how niggas who wanna get sanctioneD
Put up some girly attitude just to attract attention
The industry used to be knOwn for grooming real talk
Buh now its just some phoney ass people that's going actors
Now if money and fame are the only factors
Then patience and gain will be the actors that were left off
Autotune Was killed  but it was never buried
So it walks amongst the living likE an undead spirit
Haunting the game uhm sorTta like molly hartley
So we'll just kill it again and this time make sure its buried
Niggas instead of being fly like birds
Be tweaking they voices so that they now sound like birds
Only problem Is how they forget that birds just sing
So quit rap homie go ahead and try some new things
Make a wish, make a wish, make a wish
We know if wishes were horses, everybody wouLd be kings
So we'll all have horses, and the only thing left in the game wouLd be corpses, synopsis


Verse             2
2, Its like a Catch 22
Should I place some shots Or maybe create a bullet holE through
The heads of those that spit rubbish and den cAll it the truth
Misleading the masses telling them how they are the proof
Of what may happen if they don't think outsiDe of the roof
So they're out there in vocal booths
Spitting disgraceful spoofs
So nOw we're useD to the fact we're being used
Instead oF using our knowledge as power to protect the truth In truth the listeners  behave just like bitches do
Cos its bitches that Enjoy being lIed to
So I should, stand up and fight too
Pick up a shield and sword thE iNdustry dies we all  die too
I'm a simile to martin luther cos I av a dream
That real rap will one day be the picture on the widest screen
So let's be mean Osama bin laden
Dropping bombs on counterfeits until we hear them screAm
Since the death of john the baptist there's been violence
And the ones that take it by force are the violent
At the sound of the siren
Just get violent
This the death of autotune moment of silence!


Verse        3
On a third thought It wouldn't hurt to throw some shots
Just place scOpe 'long the coordinates of some hot shots
Trynna sit Em Down and talK to them wouldn't work
So I just cooked a meal for they brains I call that foOd for thought
They say hiphop Is dead, now that's some real shit
So real rappers are oNly spitting out some dead shit
Buh dead or alive, we knee deep in this rap shit
This Is a resurrection, get the fuck Outta  that tomb bitch
Now for y'all that branded yourselves after fish skins
THat are slimey and slippeRy like fish kins
Or even as wet as the insIdes of a bitchs skin
I bring them out and eat em all up like puskins
Yuck!
Y'all shouldn't even talk
Bring em out, lay em down, u all deserve to be flogged
Strap thEm tight to the chair, electrocute they asses
Or maybe lethal injection would just do the magic
Now for y'all that spit real like a seminar class
Cheers to yall, u eaves dropping u hear the clink of glass
It was a massacre bury the bodies en masse
In nomine partre.. Oh! fuck it....... its a reqiem mass

raw.embed_content: Read “Dead Or Alive” by Reezy on Genius
